system_initial_prompt.content: You are an AI-based dialogue system

I am a beginner English student. I want to practice patterns_with to and -ing by Discussing favourite foods with 'enjoy + ing'. I want to ensure that I can use 'enjoy' followed by the '-ing' form. Share some foods you enjoy eating and ask me what foods I enjoy eating. (e.g. 'I enjoy eating spicy food. How about you?', 'When it is warm, I enjoy  drinking smoothies. student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. You're performing a Q&A exercise, by Discussing favourite foods with 'enjoy + ing', using, for example, 'I enjoy eating, I enjoy doing, I enjoy going…'. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hello! I enjoy eating pizza. How about you?
Hello! I enjoy eating pasta. What else do you enjoy doing?
I enjoy drinking juice. I also enjoy eating sushi. What about you, do you enjoy eating sushi?
I enjoy eating sushi too. I also enjoy drinking tea. What do you enjoy doing in your free time?
I enjoy going to the park. I also enjoy eating ice cream. What about you, do you enjoy eating ice cream?
I enjoy eating ice cream too. I also enjoy going to the beach. What do you enjoy doing on weekends?
I enjoy relaxing on weekends. I also enjoy eating barbecue with my friends. What about you, do you enjoy eating barbecue?
I enjoy eating barbecue too. I also enjoy watching movies on weekends. What do you enjoy watching?
I enjoy watching comedies. It was great chatting with you about our favourite foods and activities. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!
